description:
Pairs of aliens suddenly start showing up in Natsumi`s bedroom, and they`re especially interested in her bottom drawer... Later, Keroro wakes up into a dream and he`s not alone. Natsumi and his platoon are also there, and they`re trapped with seemingly no way out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsumi, Secret of the Dresser / Keroro, You Were in my Dream
夏美 タンスの秘密 / ケロロ 夢の中に君がいて
